    • Uses of RankingDiscountModel in es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.metrics.rank

      Classes in es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.metrics.rank that implement RankingDiscountModel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExponentialDiscountModel
      Exponential ranking discount: disc(k) = base^k.
      class  LogarithmicDiscountModel
      Logarithmic discount: disc(k) = 1 / log_2(k + 2).
      class  NoDiscountModel
      No discount: disc(k) = 1.
      class  ReciprocalDiscountModel
      Reciprocal discount: disc(k) = 1 / (k + 1).
